tool_description: A powerful AI algorithm API when given text content detects if the content has strong words or not.
name: Kiara Content Detection v1
title: Kiara Content Detection v1

api_list.name: kiara.spam
api_list.description: Given text content, gives return a content entered if not rude with a status 'Successful' and returns a status 'Unsucessful' only for rude words
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kiara-content-detection-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/content-detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kiara-content-detection-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kiara-content-detection-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/content-detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kiara-content-detection-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
